creator: dima_idessis@gmx.de
text:
Hello,

I'm using the jMeter for long time and I'm using the same data file and the same soap message with header <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>. In the new version I alway get an error on server side when the name field contains "ß". I already tried to add encoding to http header manager but nothing helps. Please check this bug.

Thanks

Which version of JMeter works OK?
What sampler are you using?

Can you provide the simplest possible test case that works in the older version of JMeter and fails in the new one please?
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
No further details provided; cannot reproduce the problem.

Please re-open with simple test case if there is still a problem.
creator: sebb@apache.org
